skills.name: Amethyst Cat's-Eye
skills.description: [SP: 0][CD: 0] The weapon active's CD, max charges, and effects are based on wielder type. After casting Ultimate or exiting, a icy crystal which lasts for 10s is created at wielder's location. CD: 4s. Triggering it again resets the duration. The crystal deals 150.0% ATK of Ice DMG every 2 seconds to enemies within 10 meters. When the crystal is created, team Ice DMG increases by 12.0% for 10s. Triggering it again resets the duration.

skills.name: Phantasmagorical
skills.description: Wielder's Total DMG increases by 20.0%. Team's Total DMG increases by 8.0% (cannot stack).
